docs.text:
JAXTAM.jl Documentation




JAXTAM.jl Documentation


IO


API










IO




User Configuration


#


JAXTAM.config
 
 
Function
.


config()




Returns the full configuration file data


source


config(key_name::Union{String,Symbol}, key_value::Union{String,Symbol})
    _config_edit(String(key_name), String(key_value))




Adds 
key_name
 with 
key_value
 to the configuration file and saves


source


config(key_name::Union{String,Symbol})




Returns the value of 
key_name


source


#


JAXTAM.config_rm
 
 
Function
.


config_rm(key_name::Union{String,Symbol})




Removes 
key_name
 from the configuration file and saves changes.


source




Master Table Management


#


JAXTAM.master
 
 
Function
.


master(mission_name::Union{String,Symbol})




Reads in a previously created 
.jld2
 master table for a specific 
mission_name
 using a path provided by 
_config_key_value(mission_name)


source


master()




Loads a default mission, if one is set, otherwise throws error


source


#


JAXTAM.master_query
 
 
Function
.


master_query(master_df::DataFrame, key_type::Symbol, key_value::Any)




Wrapper for a query, takes in an already loaded DataFrame 
master_df
, a 
key_type
 to search over (e.g. 
obsid
), and a 
key_value
 to find (e.g. 
0123456789
)


Returns the full row for any observations matching the search criteria


source




API


These are low(er)-level functions which typically shouldn't be called by users.


#


JAXTAM._config_gen
 
 
Function
.


_config_gen(config_path::String=string(pwd(), 
/user_configs.jld2
))




Generates a user configuration file at 
config_path
, by default, file is placed in the JAXTAM module dir.


Config file is 
/user_configs.jld2
, excluded from git.


source


#


JAXTAM._config_load
 
 
Function
.


_config_load(config_path=string(pwd(), 
/user_configs.jld2
))




Loads data from the configuration file.


source


#


JAXTAM._config_edit
 
 
Function
.


_config_edit(key_name::String, key_value::String;
        config_path=string(pwd(), 
/user_configs.jld2
))




Edit configuration file, automatically changes the 
_config_edit_date
 value.


source


#


JAXTAM._config_rm
 
 
Function
.


_config_rm(key_name::String;
        config_path=string(pwd(), 
/user_configs.jld2
))




Removes a the key 
key_name
 from the configuration file, then saves the changes.


source


#


JAXTAM._config_key_value
 
 
Function
.


_config_key_value(key_name::Union{String,Symbol}, config_path=string(pwd(), 
/user_configs.jld2
))
    config_data = _config_load(config_path)




Loads and returns the value for 
key_name


source


#


JAXTAM._master_read_tdat
 
 
Function
.


_master_read_tdat(master_path::String)




Reads a raw 
.tdat
 table from HEASARC mastertable archives, parses the ASCII data, finds and stores column names, cleans punctuation, converts to 
DataFrame
, and finally returns cleaned table as 
DataFrame


source


#


JAXTAM._master_save
 
 
Function
.


_master_save(master_path_jld2, master_data)




Saves the 
DataFrame
 master table to a 
.jld2
 file, under the key 
master_data


source
